mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, name, phone, address, status, price, order_time, pay_time, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{status}, #{price}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( oid, gid, title, image, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{gid}, #{title}, #{image}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
